website_summaries.verdict: Burt's Bees delivers with natural ingredients you and your dog will love.
pros: Natural ingredients work to absorb excess moisture from your dog’s ears
Peppermint provides a cooling sensation as well as a pleasant scent
A little product goes a long way
cons: Too gentle for intense ear infections, better suited for regular maintenance

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: This just didn't keep my dogs ears clean of debris. It took a lot of rubbing to clean off the outer ear as well so I have to think it wasn't doing what was needed on the inside, hence many extra cleanings. I loved the idea of the natural ingredients and it smelled good but my dog was kind of miserable with the extra rubbing and frequency of treatments. I ended up buying a more traditional ear cleaner that took care of the ear debris it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog Ear Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It's showing up as a tear-stain remover under my review, but I bought the Ear Cleaner. Compared to the Ear Cleaner I got from a vet, he takes this better. I think the vet formula had peroxide or something that foamed up and startled him. This stuff does not. It has a pleasant smell and it only takes one person to clean his ears. Took two with the foamy vet stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean my pup’s ears and chose this brand because it’s well known. About 15 minutes after I cleaned his ears he started drooling excessively and running around looking for a place to hide. We rushed him to the vet and they gave him an anti nausea shot and did blood work to check his levels. They rinsed his ears with a solution to get the cleaner out to get him some quick relief. Poison control was also called to be on the safe side. He had an allergic reaction to the oils. There was no warning regarding this anywhere. Sharing for awareness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I personally love burts bees for humans
customer_reviews.text: I personally love burts bees for humans, I figured it would be the best I could get for my beloved puppy. Most vets suggest not to use ear cleaning solutions with this because it doesn't make things better. It smells fantastic, but I was sad to hear and read about it having alcohol!

product_meta.title: Burt's Bees Ear Cleaner with Peppermint & Witch Hazel | Dog Ear Cleaner With Natural Ingredients to Soothe Irritation and Calm |Ear Cleaner Solution pH Balanced for Dogs
product_meta.description:
Style:1 PackSince 1984, Burt's Bees has been working with nature to create products that nurture your skin. We believe that pets are family, so we're bringing the same natural attention and care to your closest furry friends. Burt’s Bees for Dogs Ear Cleaner is made with some of nature’s finest ingredients for your peace of mind and a happy dog. Burt’s Bees uses all natural ingredients because we wanted a powerful but safe way to clean your dog’s sensitive ears without any harmful chemicals or irritants. Tap into nature’s power with Burt’s Bees for Dogs Ear Cleaner made with Witch Hazel to cleanse the ears, remove excess moisture, and prevent build up and Peppermint Oil to soothe the affected areas. The 99.9% natural formula is made with the highest quality ingredients. Burt's Bees Ear Cleaner For Dogs is pH balanced especially for your dog or puppy and is made in the USA. Pet ear cleaner is 100% safe, and free of fragrances, sulfates, colorants, and harsh chemicals. Directions: Place the dog ear cleaner bottle at the entry of the ear canal and squeeze 2-4 drops inside. Gently massage ear and repeat twice weekly as needed. Store in a cool, dry place. Ingredients: Water, SDA 40 Alcohol, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Peppermint Oil, Witch Hazel, Melaleuca Alternifolia Oil. Safety Warning: In case of contact with eyes, flush thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children and pets to avoid possible consumption. Will not wash off topical flea & tick treatment when following treatment manufacturer's directions.

feature_bullets: CLEANS AND SOOTHES DOG'S EARS — Burt's Bees dog ear cleaner cleans, soothes, and removes excess moisture from your dog or puppy's ears. Dog ear cleaner solution helps prevent dog ear infection.
